## ü§î Overview
- **Get an AI agent or AI copilot for Zendesk.**
- Works across all channels like tickets, emails, chat and social.

## ü§ñ Get an AI agent
The AI can automatically respond to incoming queries, tag and triage them, and escalate to humans as needed.

For instance, here the AI is automatically responding to the customer.

![](https://i.imgur.com/KKhu9gX.gif)

Likewise, here the AI is leaving an internal note with a draft reply, and also tagging the ticket.

![](https://i.imgur.com/7124ZzX.gif)

You can integrate this AI into your Zendesk across all channels including tickets, emails, chat / messaging and social. For instance, here the AI is embedded in Zendesk Chat.

![](https://i.imgur.com/bycCmgG.png)

## ‚úçÔ∏è Get an AI Copilot
Instantly get draft replies for any ticket. Train the bot on your past tickets, help center, macros, and your style of writing, and watch it craft the right reply.

![](https://i.imgur.com/CseRlFU.gif)


## üîå Integrate, train, and customize

Train AI on your **past tickets, help center, Google Docs, Notion, Confluence, PDFs, developer documentation** and more.

You can also integrate the AI with apps for real time information look up or specific actions. For instance:
- Connect with **Shopify** üõçÔ∏è so the AI can retrieve delivery information for a customer or change their address details
- Connect with an **internal database** üíª so the AI can retrieve pricing information for a product inquiry
- Connect with **Jira** so the AI can create an issue and escalate to the development team.

You can fully customize how your bots sound, which actions they do, and when they should escalate to humans. You can also create multiple different bots to behave however you need them to.

![](https://i.imgur.com/ik80WvI.gif)
